title: Geyser
summaries: The Geyser is a trap that spews a vertical stream of fire which deals a base damage of 40 / 80 / 120 and a knockback of 2 (Very weak). It will activate when a player touches it or when it is triggered via wire. Geysers are found naturally-placed in random areas that are deep enough to generate lava, including the Underworld and deeper Cavern areas. They are generated without Pressure Plates or wires attached to them.
Geysers consume no <linked>ammunition</linked>, and their output is limited only by a cooldown period of 3.33 seconds. Geyser streams extend approximately 20 tiles up or down, depending on placement.
Geysers can be placed on the top or bottom of <linked>blocks</linked>, facing upward or downward respectively, but not sideways.

statistics.Sell: 20 SC
